game.name: Impossible Car Stunts 3D
game.description:
Not every gamer dares to perform the role of a stuntman! Do you think that your driving capabilities allow you to perform challenging driving stunts? Join Impossible Car Stunts 3D and be prepared to drive top-speed cars on the crazy and tricky tracks! This brand new racing game will bring you to a platform where you have to face off the insane challenges on the sky-high driving tracks. Get a chance to perform the unmatched crazy stunts to become a professional driver!

This driving adventure will definitely help you to take to the tracks where you will be rewarded if you reply firmly to the deadly stunts and high jumps. Only expert drivers can drive on hard and dangerous tracks. Try to put your awesome car driving skills to the test to race your vehicle on curvy and tricky tracks in this HTML5 3D car game! Keep your eyes on the screen and put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen to avoid your car falling down otherwise you would lose your game!

Be careful and drive safely on the ramp obstacles and other hurdles and drive for as long as possible to create your best high score! The ultimate HD graphics and intuitive controls combined with the seamless gameplay will allow you to enjoy a new era of driving simulation. Do as many stunts and apply as many tricks as possible until you reach to the finish point! Do not forget to grab the coins to unlock new car models in this cool driving simulation. Good luck to become a real stunt rider in our other popular titles from the category of free car games and have fun online without download!
